name: LITTLE EXORCIST
description: In this game you'll control the eponymous little exorcist. Solve puzzles, note down important clues and carry out exciting dialogs with abstruse characters. LE is the first "real" game I ever made, which is why it is still very bugy. I stopped Development around the start of 2020, because i just got bored. Also only in german because 15-year old Raphi was too insecure to make an english game... sorry :/
